set.name: DMART-03 Fabulous Art: The Faerie Library

card.name: Esmer, Celestial Faerie / How about a cup of tea?

property.name: Name2
property.value: How about a cup of tea?

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may put one of your shields into your mana zone. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Shieldify the top card of your deck. At the start of your next turn, put one of your shields into your hand. (You can't use the 'shield trigger'.)

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may put one of your shields into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Shieldify the top card of your deck. At the start of your next turn, put one of your shields into your hand. (You can't use the 'shield trigger'.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-03 Fabulous Art: The Faerie Library

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one in your mana zone, add one to your hand and put one into your graveyard. Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than the card put into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-03 Fabulous Art: The Faerie Library

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ If you have all civilizations in your mana zone, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-03 Fabulous Art: The Faerie Library

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone tapped, and put the other one on the bottom of your deck. If you put a fire card into your mana zone in this way, after you cast this spell, return it to your hand instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-03 Fabulous Art: The Faerie Library

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this spell from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
